title: Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore: Cowles Bog
body: Cowles Bog        NPS Collection       Facilities Open Daily: 7:00 a.m. - 30 minutes past sunset  Parking for cars in a north lot near the Dune Acres guard shack, and a south lot by Mineral Springs Road & Highway 12 Porta-potty Information board listing current park activities  Street Address / Road Intersection N. Mineral Springs Road & U.S. Highway 12 Chesterton, IN 46304 GPS Coordinates 041.38.55N 087.05.08W           Trails Cowles Bog Trail and Greenbelt Trail         Click image for full trail map.        Visitor Activities  Bird along the dike and trail Walk up a steep dune on a designated trail Hike two miles to the beach Anchor your boat near the shore and picnic on the beach  Fun Facts  This is where Henry Cowles conducted his historical plant studies. Excellent site for birding
